about_the_game:
Step into the chair of a therapist and navigate the complex world of human emotions and weird personalities in Therapist Simulator!

This narrative-driven game puts you in the role of a therapist managing a diverse roster of patients. Each session brings a unique story, offering you choices to guide the conversation, uncover deeper truths, or hilariously steer the session off course. As you progress, you’ll customize your cozy office, manage your schedule, and even influence the lives of your patients beyond the therapy room.

Key Features:

  • Dynamic Patient Stories: Experience hand-crafted personalities and dialogue, enhanced by AI, and carefully curated by real people.

  • Branching Choices: Your dialogue decisions shape each patient’s journey—and your own.

  • Cozy, Immersive Environment: Set in a charming Manhattan office, complete with a dynamic window view of the bustling city below.

  • Humor Meets Emotional Depth: Balance lighthearted absurdity with deeply human experiences.

  • Replayability: Endless procedural patients keep the game fresh, even after completing the main story.

Whether you want to help patients, mess with their heads, or simply decorate your office to perfection, Therapist Simulator offers an engaging and unpredictable experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: i5 3550 / Ryzen 5 2500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: i5 7600K / Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
